widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (300, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (310, 1), size = (250, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (570, 1), size = (300, 40), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (900, 1), size = (500, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("TSmediaFont", 35),gFont("TSmediaFont", 30)], "itemHeight": 48 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (18, 18), size = (36,56), png = 1), # Status Icon, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (78, 0), size = (500, 56), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT| RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (4, 4), size = (59, 59), png = 2), # action Icon, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (578, 4), size = (132, 32), png = 7), # action Icon, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 36)], "itemHeight": 72 }
